ai-tha-ap254:1.1_0: “Having given up the praise of the gods,
ai-tha-ap254:1.3_0: desiring to make (them), desiring to do the duties,
ai-tha-ap254:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap254:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable eleven verses.
ai-tha-ap254:6.1_0: Third a second rainy season residence in the Elder Nun Commentaries,
